title: Smologies #11: SNAILS & SLUGS with Jann Vendetti
description:
The SMOL version of an ep about smol precious creatures, we're talkin' slimy little angels with bellies for feet... literally! That's what gastropod means! We've got Dr. Jann Vendetti of the Natural History Museum of LA County to talk with Alie about snail-based beauty products, escargot, urban snails, thousands and thousands of teeth, and whether or not you should adopt a rabbit-sized pet snail. 

Click here for the full-sized, somewhat filthy version

SLIME project at NHM.org

Theme song by Harold Malcolm
author: helloalieward@gmail.com (Alie Ward)
